channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NE
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NE

item.title: Report E-2024050339
item.description:
Report E-2024050339

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-20T15:12:17+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-20
  • City: GRAND ISLAND
  • State: NE
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: CLEAN HARBORS ENVIRONMENTAL SERVICES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: When driver stopped for the end of the day during his post trip he notice a liquid on the trailer floor when performing his post trip at approximately 1830ct. He called the our emergency response team and they were dispatched to address the issue. The team arrived on sight at 2230. The then dawned the proper PPE and entered the trailer gaining access to the container that was leaking. There was a small pinhole in drum and the drum was placed into a Salvage drum. The material was then collected with absorbents and the disposed of in the appropriate manner. The clean up was completed around 0300ct.
